comments: With all on her plate, she still puts in time, effort and concern for her students. I mean, who - in her position - would continue here with all that\'s going on in her family\'s very public life? But in the classroom she\'s simply Dr. Biden. One-on-one she\'s motivating and has high expectations. A tough but fair grader, too.

She gives you different comments. one time I gave her a paper correcting what she commented; guess what happened? she corrected it into something different and said that it is not a good way to write like that. you do not know what she wants. don\'t take her

comments: Dr. Jill Biden is an outstanding professor. Her approach helps students to become excellent writers and develop organizational skills. Dr. Biden gives a lot of homework, but motivated and well-organized students can cope with homework easily. I highly recommend her.

comments: Jill Biden is a good Professor. If you care about your GPA you should not take her. u will get a lot of homework that you won\'t able to manage. journal, reading (40 chances), vocabulary act. Overall, u will learn a lot in her class, but it is nearly impossible to get an A. I did not get an A, even though I didn\'t miss any assignment.

comments: I absolutely hate English. But she made it applicable to work and life. Yes, it\'s a lot of work. But it\'s not really hard. She challenges you to become a better a writer and to have an open mind. Not to be a writer, but better communicator. She\'s makes a point to know her students. Truly enjoyed her class, definitely recommend her.

comments: Dr. Biden is an excellent professor who is inspirational in all ways. Many do well in her class, those who don\'t often complain that she is "hard" and "expects too much". She is incredibly gentle and not very demanding, and turns even ESL students into proficient writers if they put in a little effort. Put in work and you\'ll easily succeed.

comments: Professor Biden is harsh and doesn\'t help her students. English was my favorite subject till I took that class. For anyone taking it now for English 111 or another, DROP IT NOW! She isn\'t clear on what she wants and she is such a tough grader. I didn\'t know my grade until the end of the semester. So many essays\'s and for those beginners do not take.

comments: Great teacher, for those who didn\'t take Honors or AP English this is the class you need. She will show you step-by-step how to write a research paper. The kids who struggled or dropped, are simply the ones who didn\'t do the work. Show up, try hard, and do your work, you will pass. She\'s nice and pretty funny, but be warned she is really liberal.
